title: MPfree: Beaufields – Lost At Last (Live from St Stephens Church Artarmon)
content:
Prior to hearing this sublime live track from Beaufields, I’m embarrassed to say that I wasn’t familiar with the Australian trio.

Lost At Last is a simply stunning piano driven ballad, forging crevasses in my heart that I didn’t know could exist. The vocals of lead singer Hannah Cameron are far and away some of the best live vocals I’ve ever heard, varying between fragile and bliss inducing, and desperately strained. I’m unsure as to what else I could possibly say to convey the sheer of beauty of this track, check out Lost At Last below.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
